3 (extended) |duration= |event=[[Gandalf]] and the company from [[Helm's Deep]] arrive at [[Isengard]]
[[Merry]] and [[Pippin]] are reunited with [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]], and [[Gimli]] |characters=[[Gandalf]], [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]], [[Gimli]], [[Merry]], [[Pippin]] |previous=[[Journey to the Cross-roads]] |next=[[The Voice of Saruman (scene)|The Voice of Saruman]] }} '''The Road to Isengard''' is the third scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was extended in the latter edition. {{title}} ==Synopsis== [[Gandalf]], [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]], [[Gimli]], [[Théoden]], and [[Éomer]] ride through [[Fangorn Forest]], approaching [[Isengard]]. [[Merry]] and [[Pippin]] sit atop a wall, laughing and smoking the [[Longbottom Leaf]] that [[Flotsam and Jetsam (scene)|they found in Saruman's storeroom]]. As they see Gandalf and the others ride out of the forest, Merry stands and greets them, much to the delight of Aragorn. {{blockquote|You young rascals! A merry hunt you've led us on, and now we find you, feasting and smoking!|[[Gimli]] to [[Merry]] and [[Pippin]]}} Merry tells them that [[Treebeard]] has taken over Isengard. {{references}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King scenes|03]]
